price: Among us are some who are Muslims and some who are deviant[6]. Those who accepted Islam have sought the true guidance,
arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلۡمُسۡلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلۡقَٰسِطُونَۖ فَمَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوۡاْ رَشَدٗا
footnotes: [6] i.e., deviant from the right way.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
